channel.title: Need Help ( Must be good with . bats)
channel.description:
Im creating my own Compiler , with even more features than " Mod Taharoks perfect compiler ".. im adding color and Runs server now , this is the code im using for color: [code]echo Please select a color to change the backround to: echo. echo black echo white echo red echo yellow echo green echo blue echo purple echo. echo. set /p back=Color: if %back%== black (set b=0) if %back%== white (set b=7) if %back%== red (set b=4) if %back%== yellow (set b=6) if %back%== green (set b=2) if %back%== blue (set b=1) if %back%== purple (set b=5)[/code] And of corse ive added " Color " the the menu to select.. and ive added : [code]if %c%==color goto color if %c%==Color goto color if %c%==COLOR goto color[/code]
But it still wont work.. im sure im missing something out but im not sure what

ill make ya one im pretty good with bats.

item.title: Need Help ( Must be good with . bats)
item.dc:creator: @ChemicalReaction1 ChemicalReaction™
item.description:
@ChemicalReaction1 wrote:

Im creating my own Compiler , with even more features than " Mod Taharoks perfect compiler "… im adding color and Runs server now , this is the code im using for color:

echo Please select a color to change the backround to: echo. echo black echo white echo red echo yellow echo green echo blue echo purple echo. echo. set /p back=Color: if %back%== black (set b=0) if %back%== white (set b=7) if %back%== red (set b=4) if %back%== yellow (set b=6) if %back%== green (set b=2) if %back%== blue (set b=1) if %back%== purple (set b=5)
And of corse ive added " Color " the the menu to select…
and ive added :

if %c%==color goto color if %c%==Color goto color if %c%==COLOR goto color

But it still wont work… im sure im missing something out but im not sure what

Read full topic
